name: HeyForm
title: heyform.net
payoff: Build forms for small business success
shortDescription: HeyForm is an open-source form builder designed to enhance small business operations by allowing users to create customized, branded forms. It supports responsive designs that work on all devices, ensuring accessibility and higher completion rates. Businesses can use HeyForm to create various forms such as contact forms, feedback surveys, and registration forms, making it versatile for different user interactions.
cons: May require technical skill for customization

aiSuggestedAlternatives.name: Typeform
aiSuggestedAlternatives.reason: Offers more design flexibility and integration

aiSuggestedAlternatives.name: Google Forms
aiSuggestedAlternatives.reason: Free and integrates with Google Suite
